title: All Parents Are Liars 🎙 #178
description:
Over the weekend Myles’ found the greatest hack involving ladders and having people get you stuff. (03:00) Jerrod has his own life hack with his leaking 2011 Chevy Cruz. (07:43) Investing in phone chargers is by far the best investment according to Tyler. (12:13) Myles has a million dollar idea called “Night-Care”, so the parents in your life can now go out. (22:43) The gang wraps up talking about all the things our parents told us that where a straight up lie. (37:22)
